Texts.Eng: Hunting will help you obtain resources such as ^green;Raw Meat^reset;, ^green;Leather^reset; and ^orange;Bone^reset;. Try making a ^orange;Primitive Spear^reset; in your ^green;[C]rafting^reset; menu under the Weapons tab.

You can also hunt using ^orange;Bows^reset; or ^orange;Throwing Spears^reset; and ^orange;Hunting Rifles^reset;. It will be critical to your survival, as the primary means to gather ^orange;Raw Meat^reset; for cooking and eating.
